# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(demo LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target
add_executable(demo "")
set_target_properties(demo PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "demo")
set_target_properties(demo PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x64/debug")
add_dependencies(demo wrapper)
target_include_directories(demo PRIVATE
    gmsdk/include
    ../../target/cxxbridge
)
target_compile_features(demo PRIVATE cxx_std_20)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(demo PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Debug>:-Od>)
else()
    target_compile_options(demo PRIVATE -O0)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(demo PRIVATE -Zi)
else()
    target_compile_options(demo PRIVATE -g)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET demo PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(demo PRIVATE
    gmsdk
    wrapper
    libcmtd
)
target_link_directories(demo PRIVATE
    gmsdk/lib/win64
    build/windows/x64/debug
)
target_link_options(demo PRIVATE
    /DEFAULTLIB:libcmtd
)
target_sources(demo PRIVATE
    main.cpp
)

# target
add_library(wrapper STATIC "")
set_target_properties(wrapper PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "wrapper")
set_target_properties(wrapper PROPERTIES ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x64/debug")
target_include_directories(wrapper PRIVATE
    ../..
    gmsdk/include
    ../../target/cxxbridge
)
target_compile_features(wrapper PRIVATE cxx_std_20)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(wrapper PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Debug>:-Od>)
else()
    target_compile_options(wrapper PRIVATE -O0)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(wrapper PRIVATE -Zi)
else()
    target_compile_options(wrapper PRIVATE -g)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET wrapper PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(wrapper PRIVATE
    gmsdk
    libcmtd
)
target_link_directories(wrapper PRIVATE
    gmsdk/lib/win64
)
target_link_options(wrapper PRIVATE
    /DEFAULTLIB:libcmtd
)
target_sources(wrapper PRIVATE
    cxx.cpp
    main.cpp
    wrapper.cpp
)
